Deprecated API

  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.elasticsearch.common.lucene.search.function.BoostScoreFunction
    org.elasticsearch.common.compress.CompressedIndexInput
    Used only for backward comp. to read old compressed files, since we now use codec based compression
    org.elasticsearch.cluster.routing.allocation.decider.DisableAllocationDecider
    In favour for EnableAllocationDecider.
    org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.status.DocsStatus
    org.elasticsearch.search.facet.FacetBuilders
    Facets are deprecated and will be removed in a future release. Please use aggregations instead.
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.functionscore.factor.FactorBuilder
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.functionscore.factor.FactorParser
    org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.status.GatewayRecoveryStatus
    org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.status.GatewaySnapshotStatus
    org.elasticsearch.index.cache.id.IdCacheStats
    Id cache has been removed in favor for ParentChildIndexFieldData this class now reports field data memory usage for _parent field.
    org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.status.IndexShardStatus
    org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.status.IndexStatus
    org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.status.IndicesStatusAction
    org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.status.IndicesStatusRequest
    org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.status.IndicesStatusRequestBuilder
    org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.status.IndicesStatusResponse
    org.elasticsearch.common.compress.lzf.LZFCompressedIndexInput
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.MoreLikeThisFieldQueryBuilder
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.MoreLikeThisFieldQueryParser
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.NumericRangeFilterBuilder
    This filter will be removed at some point in time in favor for the range filter with the execution mode fielddata.
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.NumericRangeFilterParser
    org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.status.PeerRecoveryStatus
    org.elasticsearch.rest.action.admin.indices.alias.get.RestGetIndicesAliasesAction
    org.elasticsearch.index.merge.scheduler.SerialMergeSchedulerProvider
    This provider just provides ConcurrentMergeScheduler, and is removed in master.
    org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.status.ShardStatus
    org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.status.TransportIndicesStatusAction
  • Deprecated Annotation Types 
    Annotation Type and Description
    org.elasticsearch.common.inject.assistedinject.AssistedInject
    FactoryProvider now works better with the standard @Inject annotation. When using that annotation, parameters are matched by name and type rather than by position. In addition, values that use the standard @Inject constructor annotation are eligible for method interception.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.elasticsearch.indices.recovery.RecoverySettings.INDICES_RECOVERY_MAX_SIZE_PER_SEC
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.elasticsearch.action.search.SearchRequestBuilder.addFacet(FacetBuilder)
    Facets are deprecated and will be removed in a future release. Please use aggregations instead.
    org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.get.GetIndexRequestBuilder.addFeatures(String...)
    use #addFeatures(Feature[]) instead
    org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.get.GetIndexRequest.addFeatures(String[])
    use GetIndexRequest.addFeatures(Feature[]) instead
    org.elasticsearch.action.search.SearchRequestBuilder.addPartialField(String, String[], String[])
    since 1.0.0 use SearchRequestBuilder.setFetchSource(String[], String[]) instead
    org.elasticsearch.action.search.SearchRequestBuilder.addPartialField(String, String, String)
    since 1.0.0 use SearchRequestBuilder.setFetchSource(String, String) instead
    org.elasticsearch.common.xcontent.XContentParser.bytes()
    use XContentParser.utf8Bytes() instead
    org.elasticsearch.common.xcontent.XContentParser.bytesOrNull()
    use XContentParser.utf8BytesOrNull() instead
    org.elasticsearch.cluster.metadata.MetaData.concreteIndices(String[])
    use MetaData.concreteIndices(org.elasticsearch.action.support.IndicesOptions, String...) instead and be explicit about indices options to be used for indices resolution
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.MoreLikeThisQueryBuilder.exclude(boolean)
    This is replaced by include.
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.functionscore.ScoreFunctionBuilders.factorFunction(float)
    org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.get.GetIndexRequest.features()
    use GetIndexRequest.featuresAsEnums() instead
    org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.get.GetIndexRequest.features(String[])
    use GetIndexRequest.features(Feature[]) instead
    org.elasticsearch.common.xcontent.XContentBuilder.field(XContentBuilderString, BytesRef)
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilders.filtered(QueryBuilder, FilterBuilder)
    Use filteredQuery instead (rename)
    org.elasticsearch.index.store.VerifyingIndexOutput.flush()
    org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.optimize.OptimizeRequest.force()
    See OptimizeRequest.upgrade()
    org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.optimize.OptimizeRequest.force(boolean)
    Use OptimizeRequest.upgrade(boolean).
    org.elasticsearch.search.sort.FieldSortBuilder.ignoreUnmapped(boolean)
    Use FieldSortBuilder.unmappedType(String) instead.
    org.elasticsearch.common.compress.Compressor.indexInput(IndexInput)
    Used for backward comp. since we now use Lucene compressed codec.
    org.elasticsearch.client.Requests.indicesStatusRequest(String...)
    org.elasticsearch.action.support.IndicesOptions.lenient()
    in favor of IndicesOptions.lenientExpandOpen() whose name makes it clearer what the method actually does.
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.FilterBuilders.numericRangeFilter(String)
    The numeric_range filter will be removed at some point in time in favor for the range filter with the execution mode fielddata.
    org.elasticsearch.common.xcontent.ToXContent.Params.paramAsBooleanOptional(String, Boolean)
    since 1.0.0 use ToXContent.Params.paramAsBoolean(String, Boolean) instead
    org.elasticsearch.common.xcontent.ToXContent.MapParams.paramAsBooleanOptional(String, Boolean)
    org.elasticsearch.common.xcontent.ToXContent.DelegatingMapParams.paramAsBooleanOptional(String, Boolean)
    org.elasticsearch.rest.RestRequest.paramAsBooleanOptional(String, Boolean)
    org.elasticsearch.search.builder.SearchSourceBuilder.partialField(String, String[], String[])
    since 1.0.0 use SearchSourceBuilder.fetchSource(String[], String[]) instead
    org.elasticsearch.search.builder.SearchSourceBuilder.partialField(String, String, String)
    since 1.0.0 use SearchSourceBuilder.fetchSource(String, String) instead
    org.elasticsearch.client.IndicesAdminClient.prepareStatus(String...)
    org.elasticsearch.node.service.NodeService.putNodeAttribute(String, String)
    org.elasticsearch.node.service.NodeService.removeNodeAttribute(String)
    org.elasticsearch.action.search.SearchRequestBuilder.setFacets(byte[])
    Facets are deprecated and will be removed in a future release. Please use aggregations instead.
    org.elasticsearch.action.search.SearchRequestBuilder.setFacets(byte[], int, int)
    Facets are deprecated and will be removed in a future release. Please use aggregations instead.
    org.elasticsearch.action.search.SearchRequestBuilder.setFacets(BytesReference)
    Facets are deprecated and will be removed in a future release. Please use aggregations instead.
    org.elasticsearch.action.search.SearchRequestBuilder.setFacets(Map)
    Facets are deprecated and will be removed in a future release. Please use aggregations instead.
    org.elasticsearch.action.search.SearchRequestBuilder.setFacets(XContentBuilder)
    Facets are deprecated and will be removed in a future release. Please use aggregations instead.
    org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.get.GetIndexRequestBuilder.setFeatures(String...)
    use #setFeatures(Feature[]) instead
    org.elasticsearch.common.io.UTF8StreamWriter.setOutputStream(OutputStream)
    Replaced by UTF8StreamWriter.setOutput(OutputStream)
    org.elasticsearch.client.IndicesAdminClient.status(IndicesStatusRequest)
    org.elasticsearch.client.IndicesAdminClient.status(IndicesStatusRequest, ActionListener)
    org.elasticsearch.action.support.IndicesOptions.strict()
    in favor of IndicesOptions.strictExpandOpen() whose name makes it clearer what the method actually does.
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilders.textPhrase(String, Object)
    use QueryBuilders.textPhraseQuery(String, Object) instead
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilders.textPhrasePrefix(String, Object)
    use QueryBuilders.textPhrasePrefixQuery(String, Object) instead
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilders.textPhrasePrefixQuery(String, Object)
    Use QueryBuilders.matchPhrasePrefixQuery(String, Object)
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilders.textPhraseQuery(String, Object)
    Use QueryBuilders.matchPhraseQuery(String, Object)
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.MultiMatchQueryBuilder.useDisMax(boolean)
    use a tieBreaker of 1.0f to disable "dis-max" query or select the appropriate MultiMatchQueryBuilder.Type
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.elasticsearch.index.analysis.StandardHtmlStripAnalyzer(Version)
    use StandardHtmlStripAnalyzer.StandardHtmlStripAnalyzer(org.apache.lucene.util.Version, org.apache.lucene.analysis.util.CharArraySet) instead
  • Deprecated Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant and Description
    org.elasticsearch.search.aggregations.support.ValueType.ANY
